author: Julie Steinberg
title: Chinaâ€™s HNA Group to Sell Stake in Hilton Worldwide
text:
HNA Group Co. is preparing to sell some or all of its stake in the Hilton hotel chain, a marquee investment the Chinese conglomerate made a year ago, as it continues to unload its overseas holdings.
The company is planning to sell at least part and possibly all of its roughly one-quarter stake in Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc., according to a Hilton securities filing Thursday. The stake is currently valued at $6.3 billion, and HNA could stand to make a nearly $2 billion profit, before accounting for leverage that would further...
